game.title: The Quest for the Golden Relic
game.objective: Uncover the Legacy of the Lost Kingdom
game.description: A daring quest to uncover a legendary artifact hidden deep within ancient ruins. Solve riddles, conquer challenges, and navigate through mystical landscapes.

task.objective: Uncover the Map in the Crypt
task.description: Browse the crypt in the old monastery to discover a hidden clue revealing the next step towards the treasure.
Escape the enchanted forest by outsmarting its guardians and retrieve the key hidden behind a magical toadstool.

task.objective: Open the Trapped Gate in the Caves
task.description: Use the key to unlock the ancient chamber, bypassing a collapsing wall inside the cave network.
